internal_links.context: **Open-cell foam** is softer, less dense, and more affordable. It's excellent for soundproofing and works well in interior applications where moisture isn't a concern.
internal_links.reason: Direct mention of open-cell spray foam in the comparison table section. This is the perfect place to link to the dedicated service page where readers can learn more about this specific service offering.

internal_links.context: **Closed-cell foam** is denser, stronger, and provides nearly double the R-value per inch. It acts as its own vapor barrier and adds structural strength to walls and roof decks.
internal_links.reason: Direct mention of closed-cell spray foam in the comparison table section. Natural companion link to the open-cell link, helping readers explore both service options.
